summary: Feature request to support nested DTOs (Data Transfer Objects) as workflow parameters. Currently, unmarshalling fails when a DTO contains another DTO as a property, causing a TypeError where stdClass is assigned instead of the expected DTO type.
userImpact: Users cannot use DTOs containing nested DTOs as workflow parameters, limiting the flexibility of data structures that can be passed to workflows.
rootCause: The unmarshalling mechanism does not recursively deserialize nested objects into their corresponding DTO classes, instead leaving them as stdClass objects.
resolutionDetails: The issue was resolved by implementing support for recursive unmarshalling of nested DTOs in the serialization layer.
keyQuote: Now it causes an error: TypeError: Cannot assign stdClass to property Temporal\Tests\Unit\DTO\DeepDTO\ParentDTO::$child of type Temporal\Tests\Unit\DTO\DeepDTO\ChildDTO
